entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:03 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:03 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
